fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Multiply a player at night, doubling them and all of their visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
During the next night, all doubled players will be able to and must use their ability twice.
Once per game, you may choose to triple instead of double, which does the same thing but all tripled players must instead use their ability three times instead of two.
All Mathematics players are immune to non-beneficial effects caused by doubled or tripled players.
Doubled Solved players will have their random visits happen twice and Tripled Solved players will have their random visits happen thrice (ex: a Doubled Solved 1 by 3 will visit 6 random players or 9 if tripled)
The faction will gain 2 points whenever a doubled or tripled player targets them.
